comments.body:
All other changes were related to syntax and code review comments, but I did make changes to this block of code to 

1. properly handle the errors thrown by urllib/urllib2
2. Skip the "try multiple times" dance. Many ECS operations, including requesting an SSL certificate are ones you wouldn't *want* to try again if you received an arbitrary exception - that's the point where you would want a playbook to fail so it can be triaged, because it's worse to get multiple certificates without realizing it than to not get a certificate.
